= Music I love =
_I listen to some of the best impulses of this world..._



*Genres*: Jazz and Chinese Pop.

*Artists*: Miles Davis, John Coltrane, 陈奕迅 (Eason Chan), Cannonball Adderley, Leehom Wong (王力宏)

== Jazz ==
* _Autumn Leaves_ in Cannonball Adderley's _Somethin' Else_ is the *most impressive* jazz piece I've ever heard! Listen also: In San Francisco.
* John Coltrane's _Moment's Notice_: http://www.last.fm/music/John+Coltrane/+videos/+1-FMVUWoFHwB0
